thread.title: Bird Flu Virus in Canadian Teen Shows Mutations That Could Help It Spread Among Humans
thread.title_full: Bird Flu Virus in Canadian Teen Shows Mutations That Could Help It Spread Among Humans

title: Bird Flu Virus in Canadian Teen Shows Mutations That Could Help It Spread Among Humans
text:
Bird Flu Virus in Canadian Teen Shows Mutations That Could Help It Spread Among Humans
- Updated
[0](/extra/health/bird-flu-virus-in-canadian-teen-shows-mutations-that-could-help-it-spread-among-humans/image_d527670f-c686-5ea8-b571-f25bd6bab243.html#comments)
As featured on
FRIDAY, Nov. 22, 2024 (HealthDay News) -- In a development that health experts have warned might come, Canadian officials report that the bird flu virus isolated from a sick teen in Vancouver shows mutations that could help it spread more easily among humans.
